channel.title: Reaperscape New Server New owners New base
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left][color=red][u][i][b][center][size=50pt][b]We are a very unique custom 317 server with a friendly community, and regular updates[/b][/size]
[size=40pt][url=http://reaperscape.forumotion.co.uk/]Forums here[/url] [color=blue][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/71444989/Reaper.jar]Download Client Here[/url][/size]
[size=36pt]Owners are [shadow=red,left]James[/shadow] & Billy [/center]
[size=16pt][color=green]we are back up and running we were down due to vps errors and switchs, but we are back up and running again[/color[/size]
Active Communit Constant fixing and updating Double EXP weekend Custom Items Loads of zones OP Items Auto Vote Auto Donate DDOS Protected Point Systems 99% Uptime Achievement System Active staff Title system All stats are trainable Skilling tasks Working slayer with custom tasks Working overloads Stable server & client Bank Pin system Trivia Game Working bank buttons Active forums Many zones to fight monsters Many bosses
[url=http://postimg.org/image/j3lhthflj/][img]http://s23.postimg.org/j3lhthflj/image.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/kjx0bmiif/][img]http://s23.postimg.org/kjx0bmiif/151.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Reaperscape New Server New owners New base
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

Not a 508 you should learn the revisions before you start coding, also change the interfaces etc a big giveaway of it being Aggroth. Another thing you should change everything or almost everything before opening you’re server. Don’t just give a half done server and expect people to play it lol.

Read full topic

item.description:
@killa_kronic wrote:

[quote=“jamespk, post:4, topic:555190”][quote author=WarTusk-RSPS link=topic=674117.msg4507027#msg4507027 date=1460694095]
A complete ripoff of Aggroth. You didn’t even change the location of the Penguins. :palm:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]

read what i said its a new server and im new to coding… why hate on new comers you total ***** why not help instead of being nasty[/quote]

Don’t worry mate…

Some people don’t read but they enjoy bashing people’s thread or server.

I liked it by the way, maybe I will join. Btw I’m new to coding.
